metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13747 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Uninitialized data in rendering in Google Chrome on Android prior to 79.0.3945.79 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heap corruption via a crafted HTML page.

notes.Note: alexmurray> This only affects Android, so chromium-browser on Ubuntu is not-affected

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
